Alow everyone in the Shinsensquad !!!
  Gomenne, Henji ga osokunatta !!! ( I'm just cameback from Pluto !! he he he )
   
  Thank you so very much. Your Answer Help me so .
  Seven sensei, Yes. I was asking about the Yakuza in the bakumatsu era.
  Soshite, you said that, Shinsengumi was so loyal because they've got paid, tteittakke??
  But, in "MibuGishiDen", why they look so poor ???
  Another question..
  Could anybody tell me, except "Kiyokawa Hachirou/Serizawa Kamo's probs", are there another internal problem in Shinsengumi????
   
  thnxxxxx 4 the answer, sensei tachi !!!!
  Ja ne
   
  _Rei_

> candidates.
